pr_title: fix(telemetry): Instrumented methods map should be concurrent

timeline.bodyText: This conditional was also incorrect. Just above, the method is added to seenMethods, so this would never evaluate to true.
timeline.author: robzienert

timeline.bodyText:
Not sure if actually treating existingMethodMetrics as a ConcurrentHashMap and using the putIfAbsent semantics would be better/prefable.
In theory that would allow you to avoid this collision check and just safely use what pre-exists.
timeline.author: ajordens

replies.bodyText: Ah, yes true. I will change. It'll still need to be a CHM, though.
replies.author: robzienert

timeline.message: fix(telemetry): Instrumented methods map should be concurrent
fix(telemetry): Instrumented methods map should be concurrent
